attributes.title: Kafka Consumer Group Lag vs Time [Metricbeat Kafka]

params.filter: ((metricset.name: partition AND kafka.partition.partition.is_leader: true) OR metricset.name: consumergroup) AND NOT kafka.topic.name:__consumer_offsets

metrics.script: def lag = params.partition - params.consumergroup; if (lag < 0) { return 0 } return lag

visState.title: Kafka Consumer Group Lag vs Time [Metricbeat Kafka]
